media.headline: Cobb fans Gardner for first K
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Cobb's first K of the season
media.bigblurb: Alex Cobb grabs his first strikeout of the season as he catches Brett Gardner looking in the top of the 1st

media.headline: Dickerson's solo homer
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Dickerson opens the scoring with a solo homer
media.bigblurb: Corey Dickerson sends a solo home run to left-center field to open the scoring in the bottom of the 1st

media.headline: Ellsbury's solo shot ties it up
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Ellsbury cracks a solo homer to deep right
media.bigblurb: Jacoby Ellsbury cracks a solo home run to deep right field and ties the game at 1 in the top of the 2nd inning

media.team: Tampa Bay Rays New York Yankees
media.headline: Headley cuts down Souza Jr.
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Headley nabs Souza Jr., call confirmed
media.bigblurb: Chase Headley fires home to nab Steven Souza Jr. and the call is confirmed after a home-plate collision review and stands after a tag review

media.headline: Norris' two-run single
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Norris plates two on an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Derek Norris singles on a ground ball to right field to score Logan Morrison and Mallex Smith in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Dickerson's RBI single
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Dickerson plates Norris on an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Corey Dickerson singles on a ground ball to right field, scoring Derek Norris to take a 4-1 lead in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Morrison's catwalk-aided single
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Morrison hits one up into the catwalk
media.bigblurb: Logan Morrison sends a popup that hits the catwalk and eludes everyone, resulting in a fortuitous single

media.team: Tampa Bay Rays New York Yankees
media.headline: Sanchez nabs Kiermaier
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Kiermaier out following overturned call
media.bigblurb: Gary Sanchez throws out Kevin Kiermaier at second base following an overturned call in the 2nd inning

media.team: Tampa Bay Rays New York Yankees
media.headline: Headley nabs Souza Jr.
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Souza Jr. out at home, call confirmed
media.bigblurb: Chase Headley throws out Steven Souza Jr. at home and the call is confirmed after a collision review and stands after a tag review

media.headline: Pineda fans Longoria
media.bigblurb: Michael Pineda strikes Evan Longoria out swinging in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Ramirez forces quick groundout
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Ramirez gets Holliday to ground out, ends 8th
media.bigblurb: Erasmo Ramirez gets Matt Holliday to ground out to close out the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Miller lets his bat go
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Miller loses his bat in the 8th inning
media.bigblurb: Brad Miller loses his grip as his bat flies down the first-base line

media.headline: Kiermaier hustles for a grab
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Kiermaier snags Torreyes' base hit
media.bigblurb: Kevin Kiermaier hustles and robs Ronald Torreyes of a base hit in center field to close out the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Colome hit by liner twice
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Colome gets hit by line drives twice
media.bigblurb: Alex Colome gets hit by Jacoby Ellsbury's line drive and Chase Haedley's comebacker both in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Girardi on loss to Rays
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Girardi on Pineda's struggles in loss
media.bigblurb: Yankees manager Joe Girardi discusses a tough outing for Michael Pineda in a loss to the Rays

media.headline: Recap: NYY 1, TB 4
media.blurb: 4/5/17: Big 2nd inning lifts Rays over Yankees
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Corey Dickerson tallied a solo homer and Derek Norris plated two to lift the Rays to a 4-1 win over the Yankees
